title: Home Sounds Detection
description: Use a microphone to detect sound signatures common to a home: baby cry, cough, water tap.
long_description: This project allows you to build a model capable of detecting a number of audio signatures common to a home setting. It currently can detect 3 sounds, cough, baby cry, and water tap running, but it can easily be modified to add more.
